column1: full on off, indication that it remains a pretty slow surface, didn't quite come on, shuffles across and defends with ease
length outside off, hint of shape away this time, hangs back, opens the face and steers it to third-man
length on off, comes on really really slow, Watson stands tall and defends
length on middle, come on better there, defended back to the bowler
length outside off, Watson has a slash at it and misses. It was a scrambled-seam delivery, cut back in ever so slightly to cramp watson for room
length on off, punched straight to cover without any timing
length outside off, watches it go through to the keeper
full outside off, Rayudu leans into it and pushes it to extra cover
full outside off, throws his hands at it but can't beat the cover field

length into the body, extra bounce there for Archer, reared onto Rayudu, who fended it awkwardly. Looks in some sort of pain there Rayudu, the physio is out to attend to him. Struck on the forearm, it appears
length on off, wild swing from Rayudu, under pressure due to the dot balls, drags it along the ground to mid-on

edged and gone! Length and into the body, Rayudu looked a little rattled by the blow to the forearm couple of balls before, makes room, Archer follows him and all the batsman can manage in the end is steer it into the gloves of the keeper

big appeal and given! Watson is bemused. It was angled in on a length, seemed to have brushed his thigh pad on the way to the keeper down the leg side and he missed that by a long way. Overturned on review
length on middle, defends back to the bowler
short on middle, Watson is on the front foot but manages to pull it away from there, in front of square, helped by the slowness of the pitch and that's a boundary
slower ball on off, the best timed shot so far, just a gentle push and the ball races through the covers, only two though
length on off, Watson backs away slightly and opens the face of the bat to bisect point and short third-man for another couple
full outside off, Raina leans into it and crisply drives it straight to cover
length on off, extra bounce for Stokes, Watson gets on his toes and defends to cover
short and hammered flat and hard behind square and it goes sailing into the stands for the first six of the night
length outside off, jags away a tad, Watson has a slash but misses

slash and caught at short third-man! Archer involved in another dismissal, takes it comfortably over his head. It was on a length, just outside off, not enough room for the shot and some extra bounce, Watson couldn't get the placement right and didn't have enough elevation either for it to clear Archer
short and helped along with the angle by Jadhav who is pretty good at this shot. He was deep in the crease and in a very good position for the pull
another short one and Jadhav quickly into position again, picks it up in front of square this time for another boundary to end an eventful over
length on middle, Raina tires to swat it away through midwicket but can't beat the man
slower one outside off, held in the pitch, gripped quite a bit, Raina slashed at it but missed
top edge and goes over the keeper! Raina isn't very comfortable there, surprised by the length, shuffled a little, stuck his bat out but luckily for him the top edge comfortably eluded the keeper

edged and gone! CSK continue to play shots and continue to lose wickets. He was hanging back, Dhawal pitched this one right up, got it to move away in the air a little, Jadhav threw his bat it from the crease and only managed a nick to Buttler
length outside off, Dhoni watches it through to the keeper
length on middle, Raina, expecting the short ball again, shuffles across and pushes it towards midwicket
length, angled across this time, Raina has a tentative poke outside off and is beaten
length at the body, Raina shuffles across again and fends it away towards squareleg but manages to ride the bounce on that occasion. Tentative batting in anticipation of the short ball
length on middle and nearly dragged back on to the stumps! Dhoni stood tall and defended, and wow, that rolled back onto the stumps but the bails were unmoved. How fortunate was that
length on middle, shuffles and pushes it toiwards squareleg
That's snorter and Raina's caught in an awkward tangle! Short and fast, directed at the body, Raina didn't know where to go, nearly overbalanced but somehow evaded it
length on the pads, Dhoni helps it along to deep backward squareleg's right for two
length on the pads, Dhoni taps it on its head and fine, for another couple
full and slower on middle, Dhoni smothers the spin and defends
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
full outside off, Dhoni comes down the wicket and pushes it to midwicket
length on middle, Dhoni punches it to long-on for one
full on off, Dhoni hangs back and uses his wrists to work it towards squareleg
full on the pads, tries to work it to squareleg, misses with the bat but gets a leg bye
tossed up on off, Dhoni drills it to long-off
full outside off, driven straight to cover
length on off, pushed back to the bowler
full on off, Raina clears his front leg and pushes it to long-off
googly outside off, Raina picks it late and steers it to point
full on off, Raina comes down the wicket and drills it to long-off's left
short on middle, hint of turn away, Dhoni rocks back and pushes it to long-on
length outside off, Raina hangs back and cuts it behind square, timing it to perfection and down to the point boundary
length outside off, pushed to cover
short on middle, angled across, Raina uses his wrists and turns it around towards deep midwicket to retain strike
full outside off, a little quick and flat and Raina lofts it inside out, there's not turn and that's a fantastic shot from Raina
length on off, defended to cover
full outside off, crisply driven through the covers and long-off cuts it off to his right but can't prevent two
length and angled in, Raina tries to tickle it fine but can't get any bat
full on middle, Raina plays for the turn and gets a thick inside edge towards squareleg
full on middle, almost a yorker, drilled past the diving bowler's right and down to long-on for one
full toss on off, Raina pushes it to long-off to retain strike
and he starts with a slog! Full, on leg, and he swings across the line to deposit a maximum over long on
tossed up on middle, and dug away to the vacant deep midwicket region. They walk across for a single
back of a length on off, skidding in, and pulled behind to deep backward square
arm ball, short on middle, and worked off his waist to deep midwicket for a single
full on leg, and Dhoni paddle sweeps fine. But the fielder at short fine leg runs across to intercept
full on leg, and he drills a leg-side clip to the sweeper-fielder at cow corner. Keeps the strike
cheeky! Back of a length, wide outside off, and Raina opens his bat's face to ramp this nearly to the fielder at third man
length ball on middle, and punched from off stump to mid off
slower ball, back of a length on leg, and Dhoni goes deep into his crease, before pummeling a pull-shot along the ground to the backward-square boundary. Fielder in the deep... but no chance
offcutter on off, but back of a length. Nudged off his hips to midwicket, and Dhoni calls early for the second run
back of a length, wide outside off, and guided to Stokes at short third man. The Englishman takes a tumble, but he's alright
length ball on leg, and Raina has no trouble in shuffling across, and flicking this fine past the keeper's left for four!
back of a length, a bit of a loosener from Stokes, and Dhoni rides the bounce to pull. Deep midwicket cleans up
length ball angling across Raina, and he steers this to third man for a jogging single
slower ball, fullish outside off, but Dhoni's through his drive too early. Mistimed to cover
misses the pull! Short on off, and Dhoni tries to hoick this over to the leg side. But misses out. Rare
full just outside off, and Dhoni pushes forward with the bat's open face to drive. Played square past the fielder at point, but there's protection in the deep
back of a length, but only 125kph. Enough time for Dhoni to pull behind square for a single
hammered! Back of a length, outside off, and he skips down the wicket. Flat-bats it over the umpire's head, and long on has no chance
back of a length, wide outside off, and steered to short third man

full on middle, but Raina shuffles across the stumps to flick. Played to short fine leg, and Raina wants the single. Dhoni says no, so Raina needs to come back. Dhawal Kulkarni throws the ball at the batsman's stumps, with Raina not even attempting to come back, but he misses the direct hit. Raina survives! So close
got 'im! Rolls this slower ball, full on middle stump, and Raina backs away to lift it over cover. Through his shot too early, and the ball crashes into middle stump. Huge roar from Unadkat
length ball, on off, and he goes onto the back foot to defend
another slower one, length on off, and Bravo blocks off the front foot

dropped at cover! Full just outside off, and Dhoni came down the ground to thump a cover drive. Samson Gowtham dives to his left to try and get his hands to it, manages to get fingertips. Was a really difficult chance though. MSD had hit that with some real power
back of a length, too wide outside off, and Bravo cuts this over the infield! Not well timed, but still enough behind it for the ball to go for four
length ball, wide outside off, and fended off the back foot
slower ball, overpitched just outside off, and driven to Gowtham at cover
full on off, and Bravo flicks this off his pads past midwicket
full and wide outside off, and Bravo goes up and over! Bat's face opened, and driven over point for a boundary
back of a length outside off, and nudged away to point. Team hundred
slower ball on off, and Bravo's too early into his flick. Mistimed to the vacant midwicket region, and it's that mistime which allows the batsmen to pinch the second run
length ball, just outside off, and he cuts this fine to third man. Just a single, though
slower, length ball on off, and he muscles a cut to point. Dhoni wants Bravo to take the second, and they comfortably sprint back for it
full on off, and driven away to cover. Dhoni wants the single, and Gowtham has a shy at the stumps.... but misses
slower ball, full on middle, and Bravo looks to nudge this fine down the leg side. But he can't get the contact
slower ball, wide outside off, and cut away off the back foot. Wristy work, and that beats the fielder at point as well
slower ball, back of a length outside off, and he mistimes a cut to point
another slower one, but too wide. Dhoni reaches out, cuts behind square, and pierces the gap between point and short third man. Genius
yorker, just outside off, and dug away off the bat's toe end
full on off, and pushed off the front foot to wide mid off
muscled to deep point this time
back of a length, on off stump, and Dhoni opts to let it go. No call of a wide, a perfect delivery
Bravo backs away, and Kulkarni follows. Knee-high full toss on Bravo's body, and he mistimes a slog towards the leg side
it's a nothing ball, slow from DK, and Dhoni hammers a pull behind square. Terrific effort from Gowtham in the deep, diving across the grass to stop the ball
wiiiild! Full toss, very wide outside off stump, and the ball takes an awkward bounce just in front of Buttler. The keeper does well, stopping the ball from going for extras
shoulder high full toss, wide outside of, and cut away to deep point. Free hit coming up!
just over extra cover! Low full toss outside off, but Dhoni goes really low before lifting a shot over the off side. Crowd goes ballistic
slower ball, too short, and pulled away to deep midwicket. Stokes comes charging in to stop the second run

finds the gap Super innovative. Back of a length outside off, but Bravo waits for the ball to come to him, before slicing an uppish drive over point. Except, it takes the bat's edge, and goes between backward point and short third man
boom, boom from Bravo! Overpitched, and Kulkarni pays the price. Bravo goes low, and then plays an inside-out drive that clears the extra-cover boundary. CSK cream 24 off that over
full toss, on off stump, and Dhoni opens his bat's face to drive. Placed past point, and that goes away for four! Crowd on its feet as Dhoni raises his bat. Fifty
full on middle, and worked off his pads to midwicket for a single
pulled, but sliced and DK makes no mistake at long on. Too high for Bravo to find the optimal connection, and the attempted pull finds the fielding riding the boundary
full on off, and pushed down the ground to long on. Hands Jadeja the strike
length ball outside off, and he steers this to third man for one
back of a length, wide outside off, and tapped away to point for a walking single. Dhoni keeps strike, and Archer finishes his spell with 2-17
full on middle, and Dhoni clears his front leg to slog. Mistimed to deep midwicket
full on off, but Jadeja walks down the wicket, before absolutely hammering a shot over JU's head. Flat six, muscled, what a shot
full on middle, and this time Jadeja goes over midwicket. Protection there though
full, and wide outside off stump. Dhoni comes down the wicket, but chooses not to play a shot
slower ball, on middle, and Dhoni just waits for the ball to get to him, before pulling this over backward square! Marvellous
Length ball, wide outside off, and Dhoni waits for the ball to come to him, before flat-batting a six over long off.
back of a length, short on off, and the ball balloons over Dhoni's head

Vinod Rajpal, you called it mate! Length ball, on middle, and Dhoni stays on the back foot before muscling a six over long on. That's Dhoni's highest IPL score at the Chepaul, and CSK finish on 175 for 5
full on off, nice shape away, Rahane leans forward and defends

has he taken that? Length outside off, shaping away again, Rahane follows the swing with just his bat without getting to the pitch, it held in the pitch a little, got him high on the bat, and went aerially towards backward point, who had to dive forward, full length and did so brilliantly! Third-umpire confirms that it carried and what a start for CSK after the spectacular Dhoni finish with the bat
length on off, Samson tries to pull it without getting into a proper position, gets an inside edge back onto the body
full on off, slight swing away as well, Samson defends tentatively after nearly deciding to leave it
that's a beauty from wide of the crease! Full, swinging in and through the expansive drive attempted by Samson
length on the pads, clipped away to midwicket
short outside off and all Buttler has to do is guide it past point and it races away to the fence
length on off, Buttler waits for it and defends late
length outside off, Buttler shuffles and takes a few steps forward, opens the face and guides it to point's left for one
length on off and he fetches it on the pull, hammers it, but straight to mid-on, perhaps toe-ended it a little
full on the pads, waits for it this time and times it nicely through midwicket for a couple
yorker on off, Samson digs it out and steers it to third-man to retain strike
length outside off, too much width and Samson gets on top of the bounce and guides it past point, timing it superbly as it races away
length on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg
length on off, jags back in slightly, Buttler pushes it to mid-on
length on off, no room for Buttler, pushed back to the bowler
length outside off, comes down the wicket and pushes it to mid-off, they complete a quick single

Has he taken that at cover? Not too dissimilar to how Rahane perished. Third-umpire has been called. Length outside off, Samson goes for the drive, loses control with his bottom hand, goes aerially towards Raina at cover who dives foward and gets his hands comfortably under the ball.
full on off, Buttler slices it high in the air towards mid-off and Bravo does well running back to his left and takes it comfortably
length outside off, disconcerting bounce there, Tripathi does well to guide it towards third-man with a loose bottom hand grip
short and that's imperiously pulled behind square, flat and hard and four to get started for Smith
full toss on the pads, attemped yorker and that's easy pickings for Smith, who loves it in that area, whipped away nicely behind square for another boundary
full on off, nice stride into the ball and solidly defended towards cover-point
short and wide, Smith has a slash at it and misses. Called wide, however
short outside off, he swivels for the pull but mistimes it along the ground to mid-on. Was probably too wide outside the off stump for the stroke as well
length outside off, punched to cover-point
length outside off, comes back into the batsman there, who gets on his toes and defends to point
length outside off, chopped away towards point without any timing. Too close to the body for the stroke
short ball, misdirected, down the leg side and also too high, called wide
full on off, he skips down the wicket and drills it to mid-off's right, where Bravo does well to time his dive and keep it to one
full on off, knuckle ball, pushed to mid-on
length on the pads, pushed to midwicket's left and they scamper a single
full toss and he takes toll of it, launching it high and handsome towards deep midwicket, couple of bounces and into the fence
fired in on the pads, defended
another full toss, could be a no-ball, it was quite high, gets a thick outside edge that races away to the third-man fence. Free hit
full on middle, clears his front leg to let the bat come through and that's a beautiful swing, launches it straight down the ground for a massive six
full on the pads, tucked away towards squareleg
full outside off, driven to cover
short on the pads, helped along to short fine-leg, who makes a tumbling save to his right to restrict Smith to a single
length on off, Smith shuffles and tucks it away towards deep backward squareleg
length on the pads, nudged towards squareleg
length on middle, shuffles again and tucks it away to deep backward squareleg again
short, goes for the pull, miscues it but luckily for Tripathi lands wide of Watson at midwicket
short around the hip, helped it along fine and that's a boundary to finish Chahar's spell
tossed up outside off, Smith leans into it and pushes it through the covers for one

full outside off, caressed through the covers, the call was for two but the timing was so good that it raced across the turf, beating the diving deep extra cover fielder to his right and into the fence
full on off, pushed to long-off
full outside off, pushed to long-off
length on middle, fired in, defended
short outside off, nicely chopped away past point for a couple
length on middle, pushed to long-on
full outside off, slower, Tripathi early into the drive, pushes it aerially through the covers, but away from the deep fielder and they complete two
full outside off and this one's timed to perfection. He has been targeting that extra cover region, goes inside out
length outside off, steered to short third-man for one
length outside off, Smith waits for it to come to him and pushes it into the gap on the off side for one
full outside off, Tripathi looks to drive again, gets a thick outside edge to short third-man

and he starts with a ripper! Full on off, pretty quick, fizzed off the surface, beat Smith on the front foot and Dhoni whipped the bails off. Third-umpire was called but Smith hadn't moved his back foot
googly on off, defended
length outside off, pushed through the covers
full on middle, Tripathi drills it to long-on
full and flat on middle, pushed to long-on
chipped straight back to Tahir! Slowed this one down, dipped on Tripathi, who turned the face early in an attempt to push it to long-on but only managed to lob a simple catch back to Tahir
full on off, and nudged off his pads to square leg
full, from around the wicket. Stokes pushes forward to drive to extra cover
slower ball, nearly a yorker on off stump. Worked off the bat's toe-end to midwicket
yorker on middle, and Smith natmegs this through his legs. Ball rolls away to square leg
length ball on off, and angling in. Stokes firmly blocks off the front foot
length ball, angling down the leg side, and nudged off his waist to deep backward square. Enough time to sprint back for the second run
overpitched just outside off, and whipped down the ground to long on
leading edge but goes down the ground to long off. Tossed up on leg, and the googly was played towards the leg side. Leading edge takes it to the off side instead
full on leg, and he drills this down the ground to wide long on. They take a quick single, and hesitate for the second, but misfield from Santner allows them to complete the double
overpitched, just outside off, and bunted down the ground to long on
flatter, on middle, and worked off the back foot to deep midwicket
too full on leg stump, and dug away to midwicket. They sprint for the first, but Stokes says 'no' to the second

length ball on middle, and angling down the leg side. Smith misses the clipped-shot off his hips, and Dhoni collects. Big appeal for caught-behind from MSD, but the umpire calls it a wide. Interesting!
slower ball, lands on leg, and goes down the leg side again. Smith, though, tried to paddle this behind square but missed
length ball, just outside off, and cut to third man for a single
length ball, wide outside off, and glanced fine to third man for one
back of a length, skidder outside off, and Smith shapes up to cut. Misses
nearly a yorker on off, and driven down to long on for a single
full on middle, from around the wicket. Flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
full, just outside off, and he goes for the drive. Misses, as the ball goes under his bat and into Dhoni's gloves
back of a length on of, and turning further away. Flat-batted to long off
Tahir's running again! Full just outside off, but Smith comes down the ground and toe-ends a lofted shot. No real timing, and long-on makes no mistake
full on middle, and nudged off his pads to deep midwicket. Enough time to take the second because of Santner's misfield
full just outside off, and he toe-ends a drive to cover
full just outside leg stump, and flicked away to short fine leg. They scamper across for one
full on off, and the googly is driven back to Tahir. A fine over from the South African
flatter, on middle, and Stokes rocks back to pull. In the air, but safe at the deep despite two boundary-riders there
length ball on middle, and worked off his hips to deep backward square. Misfield from Billings allows them to take the double
full on off, and slog swept over deep midwicket! In the slog, down on one knee, and collects six runs
fuller, on middle, and he goes deep into his crease. Tapped to midwicket for a quick single
length ball on off, and he whips this off his hips to deep midwicket. Gives Stokes the strike for the final ball
length ball on middle, and tucked away to wide long on. Enough time for Stokes to come back for the second
that's a biggie! Full on off, and Gowtham - the offspinner - picks the googly well. Swings across the line, and has enough behind that shot to clear wide long on
crazy spin! Full, wide outside off, and Gowtham goes for a slogged sweep. But the ball spins further away from Gowtham, and Dhoni collects sharply
full outside leg, but turning into his pads. Gowtham looks to nudge it square, but the ball hits his pad
faster ball, flat on middle, and the attempted nudge to the leg side takes a leading edge to short third man!
full toss, low on off stump, and drilled down to long off
length ball on off, and driven down to long off. Tahir nearly gets his hands to this. An excellent spell comes to an end
sliced to cover! Full just outside off, and Gowtham looks to smoke a drive over cover. Bat's face turns in his hand, and the spliced shot goes to Raina at the 30-yard circle
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square to the point boundary! Fielder from third man can't intercept
back of a length on middle, and he taps this away to the leg side for a quick single. Good dedication from Shardul, chasing the ball
length ball, just outside off, and he drives away from his body to extra cover
length ball, skidder outside off, and going straight into Dhoni's gloves. Jofra can't get bat on ball
muscled over long on! Quick ball, full on leg, but he clears his front leg to lift a shot over the boundary. Royals need 44 off 18
slapped! Slower ball, really full outside off, and he clears his front leg, before flat-batting a six over wide long off. Royals need 38 off 17
paddled! Back of a length on middle, but Stokes shuffles across the stumps, exposes all three stumps, and then gets enough bat to find the gap between keeper and short fine leg
slower ball, full on off, and he mistimes a drive to cover. Raina dives to his left to intercept, and stops Stokes from coming back on strike
low full toss on middle, and he flicks to deep midwicket. Calls early for the second, and both these men are pretty quick
that's outta here! Full, not fast enough on middle, and he clears his front leg to hammer a six over Bravo's head. This guy can bat
yorker just outside leg stump, but the ball hits his boot and rolls away to Dhoni. Could've been a wide if Jofra got out of the delivery's way. Royals need 25 off 12 now
full on off, and angling into Stokes. He skips down the wicket to try and muscle this over to the leg side, but inside-edges the shot into his pads. They scamper across for one
sliced over point and falls safe. Full outside off, and looked to drive over cover, but edged the ball behind square instead
back of a length on middle, but slower from Shardul. Jofra pulls behind square to deep fine leg

one-handed shot for six! Holy moly. Length ball angling into Stokes from around the wicket, but he uses his wrists and swivels to pull behind square. One hand comes off his bat, but enough power behind that to go for a maximum. Unbelievable
low full toss on off, and he drills a drive to extra cover. Shorey cleans up
back of a length, outside off, and he drags a pull to deep midwicket. Royals need 12 off the final over
soft dismissal! Chinna Thala to the rescue. Low full toss on off, and Stokes tries to lift it over cover, but he's sliced this to Raina at cover
back of a length, on off, and Gopal backs away to cut this square. Ball goes over Gopal's bat. Nifty from Bravo
back of a length on middle, and the ball hits Gopal's shoulders. Delivery rolls down to third man
full and very wide outside off, and Jofra mistimes a drive to cover. Walks across for a single. His bat is broken too
in the air and taken at third man! Tahir takes the catch, and he gives the crowd a flying kiss. The Chepauk erupts. Length ball, on off, and Gopal's attempted slog takes an outside edge
length ball, on off, and flat-batted to cover. They scamper across for a single and Chennai Super Kings win by eight runs!
